[agent2] Hello agent1,

I hope we can find a way to negotiate effectively for our mutual benefit. Looking at our valuations, it seems that we have different preferences for the objects. 

From my side, I have a positive valuation for object_1 (1.66) and negative values for the others, which suggests that I would prefer to claim object_1. I recognize that you have a much higher valuation for objects_2 and object_3, so I am willing to discuss a fair exchange that could benefit us both.

If you're open to it, I propose that we agree on you taking object_2 and object_3, while I take object_1. We can discuss how to balance this out for the remaining object.

Let me know your thoughts!

As for object_4, I have a lower valuation (2.4), and I am willing to let you claim it as well if that helps us reach an agreement. 

Please let me know if this works for you or if you have any other suggestions.
